TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ObjectInfo extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Renders the property names and values of the specified object and of any subobjects that it references.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Web.WebPages.HelperResult Print (object value, int depth = 10, int enumerationLength = 1000);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Web.WebPages.HelperResult Print(object value, int32 depth, int32 enumerationLength) cil managed
Public Shared Function Print (value As Object, Optional depth As Integer = 10, Optional enumerationLength As Integer = 1000) As HelperResult
static member Print : obj * int * int -> System.Web.WebPages.HelperResult

Docs.param: The object to render information for.
Optional. Specifies the depth of nested subobjects to render information for. The default is 10.
Optional. Specifies the maximum number of characters that the method displays for object values. The default is 1000.
Docs.summary: Renders the property names and values of the specified object and of any subobjects.
Docs.returns: For a simple variable, returns the type and the value. For an object that contains multiple items, returns the property name or key and the value for each property.
Docs.exception: is less than or equal to zero.
